name: Moe! Dance - Love Idol Girls
description:
Do you love Moe Girls? If yes, Check this anime girl dancing games!

Unique characters
- There have four moe characters you can play with. for ex, Eri, Akane, Sensei and Sakura

How to play
- select girl characters, join the room and dance in an amazing rhythm game!

Dance, tap the note, listen to music, and have fun & relax in a world of songs and love with beautiful and sexy anime girl.

Watch video preview for full game play!

Free Download Limited Time!
